name: wise-glasses
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder's special moves by 10%.
short_effect: Held: Boosts the damage of special moves used by the holder by 1/10 (10%).

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is
a thick pair of glasses that slightly
boosts the power of special moves.
